name: Guppy The Mechanic
description:
Play as Guppy and attempt to kill the Kraken.

Move with WASD or arrows

Press"E", or click on the workshop button under the health bars to equip yourself.

Press space to speed up combat text

Good luck!

Made for:
Mini Jam 91

Tools/Frameworks/Things used:
MonoGame - Engine framework
Penumbra - Lighting
Myra - UI
paint.net - Drawing/editing images
Piskel - Drawing/editing images

Music: https://www.bensound.com

Made by:
Oscar H
Martin S
